name: Warrior
description: A hardened fighter who stands at the vanguard of every battle. Warriors rely on brute strength and iron resolve to outlast any foe.
bonusDescription: High HP and Strength — Low MP and Intelligence

name: Mage
description: A scholar of the arcane arts who bends reality through sheer intellect. Fragile in body but devastating in power — one wrong step is the last.
bonusDescription: High MP and Intelligence — Low HP and Strength

name: Rogue
description: A creature of shadow and opportunity. Rogues strike from the dark with lethal precision, vanishing before enemies can react.
bonusDescription: High Dexterity and Speed — Average HP and MP

name: Cleric
description: A warrior of faith who channels divine power to heal allies and smite the undead. Neither pure fighter nor pure mage — the Cleric defies easy classification.
bonusDescription: Balanced stats with high Vitality — Focus on support
